title: Enhanced Logging Framework
abstract: This proposal introduces a comprehensive enhanced logging framework providing advanced logging capabilities, structured log management, real-time monitoring, and comprehensive audit trails for improved system observability and debugging.
motivation: The system requires enhanced logging capabilities for better observability, debugging, audit compliance, and system monitoring to ensure reliable operation and facilitate troubleshooting.
rationale: A comprehensive logging framework provides essential observability, enables effective debugging, ensures audit compliance, and facilitates system monitoring for reliable governance operations.
specification: Enhanced logging framework including structured log management, real-time monitoring capabilities, comprehensive audit trails, advanced filtering and search, and integrated observability tools.
benefits: Enhanced system observability through comprehensive logging
Improved debugging capabilities with structured log management
Audit compliance through comprehensive trail documentation
Real-time monitoring enabling proactive issue detection
challenges: Performance impact of comprehensive logging on system operations
Log volume management and storage optimization
Integration with existing monitoring and observability systems

consolidation.note: Infrastructure proposal for enhanced system logging
